features.ethereumForkDescription: Our development team are developing new features to adapt our Latin american market. Fast and safe protocols.
features.ethereumBuiltInSolidyDescription: We will support all smart contracts from Ethereum/Binance Smart Chain
features.CBDCIntegrationsDescription: IoraChain have been created to Latam market. All features is focused on latin demand and also integrated for the CBDC.
features.NFTMetaversesDescriptions: Iora chain has started a MVP process called IoraPay. Fast payment system integrated from PIX (Brazillian system payment)

dapps.ioraChainDescription: Growing with fast and safe solutions. We created a Blockchain on open source code, on LATAM market demand. Full integration with FIAT/Crypto exchanges and creating every single day a new  environment to make Latam users life better.
dapps.praoraDescription: Praora is a streaming plataform which unifies all the resources you need to manage your lives and keep track of your cryptocurrencies earnings as a content producer. You can easily start streaming, create sweepstakes for your followers and sell digital products. All in one place!
dapps.caldeusDescription: Caldeus is an NFT marketplace for videos, photos, images collection arts. We built a space for visual artists from LATAM under blockchain technology.
dapps.ioraPayDescription: IoraPay is a payment system integrated into the Brazilian payment method called PIX, and also that has the functionality to make payments integrated into a wallet third, such as Metamask and Truswallet. With IoraPay users can perform quick and simple transactions directly to your Metamask wallet, without going through a centralized exchange.

roadMap.CDBCsDescription: Marketing studies of CDBCs adaptations. Researching business modal and integrations from Brazil Central Bank
roadMap.investmentsHireDescription: Through personal private investment, materials and team were hired for studies and development of user experience, as well as the development of the Iora Pay.
roadMap.validationDescription: First user experience tests, market research, beta user feedback were carried out.
roadMap.mvpLaunchDescription: Will be the launched of Iora Chain with multi-chain token bridge. First integration using Binance Smart Chain
roadMap.ioraPayDescription: Iora Pay will be launched with PIX integrations. Users will be able to transfer BRL from PIX to Metamask wallets
roadMap.ioraPayEthereumMainNet: Iora Pay wil be integrated from Iora Chain, Binance Smart Chain and Ethereun Mainet using validators
